bug.author: calvinjia
bug.summary: Fix display from byte offset field in the web ui
bug.description: Alluxio Version: 2.0.0 Describe the bug Display from byte offset field will not allow empty values. This is confusing to the user because they generally will try to backspace the 0 before entering the number they want. To Reproduce Go to browse -> click a file. Try to modify the display from byte offset field. Expected behavior The zero is deleted and the user is free to type the number of their choice.
